content: this little cutie is ready to bring some holiday cheer into your life he s round he s a little bit waddle-y and definitely hug-able you can even make him without a hat for all-year- round hugs howie measures about 7 5 inches tall when completed is this your first time doing the loop stitch no worries this is a great project to give it a try for the first time photo-instructions are provided in the pattern and if you need additional help watch our loop stitch video 1 to complete this pattern you will need * size h 5 mm crochet hook * 5 colors of worsted weight yarn ella rae classic is the brand used in the sample less than a skein of each is required white black blue yellow and red * polyester stuffing * tapestry needle * two 12mm black animal eyes available online from suncatcher eyes this is an easy level pattern and the pattern contains progress photos 1 http //www freshstitches com/loop php
